hotel name: B&B Living in Bresel, Urban B&B
neg review: Front of B&B was a bit noisy because of bus and tram.

hotel name: B&B Living in Bresel, Urban B&B
pos review: Amazing comfort and view, with extraordinary services. Good bed and tasty breakfast . Bed is really soft and comfortable including pillows !
neg review: Toilet paper could be softer and the table was a bit unbalanced

hotel name: B&B Living in Bresel, Urban B&B
pos review: Perfect stay at B&B Living in Bresel, Urban B&B. Lovely hosts, room (extremely clean and comfortable) and breakfast. Ideal for family and a really nice location. Easy to get into the centre with public transport. I will book in the future!

hotel name: B&B Living in Bresel, Urban B&B
pos review:
This b&b is the perfect accommodation on 8' walking from Jubelpark and 20' walking from the European Quarter or VUB.
It has everything you need:  fully modern equipped and a nice small tiny garden. You also have a very nice ' view from a window'. And very clean!

hotel name: B&B Living in Bresel, Urban B&B
neg review: Rooms to the street are just to lud

hotel name: B&B Living in Bresel, Urban B&B
pos review: The bedroom was spacious, very clean, modern and comfortable. The staff was very friendly and accommodating! good location. I definetly recommend it!

hotel name: B&B Living in Bresel, Urban B&B
pos review: So nice! You simply feel very welcome in the besutiful rooms with the best service ever. We will always come back. Thank you!
